document.full_text: rafa nadal cleared the latest hurdle on his quest for a third claycourt title in under a month when he overpowered frenchman michael llodra 6-2 6-2 on friday to set up a madrid masters semi-final against roger federer.
document.title: nadal through in madrid, bellucci fells berdych
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal cleared the latest hurdle on his quest for a third claycourt title in under a month when he overpowered frenchman michael llodra 6-2 6-2 on friday to set up a madrid masters semi-final against roger federer.
